name: Base Camp (ScalphaMission)
description:
Controls - 

  • WADS Move
  • Space Jump
  • E Interact
  • Left Click Fire Gun
  • Right Click Fire Grappling Hook

Welcome to the treacherous peaks of the Himalayas, where the only thing more deadly than the freezing temperatures and treacherous terrain is the elusive yeti. As a seasoned mountaineer, you must use all of your skills and wits to survive the harsh conditions, while also mining for valuable iron deposits to aid in your journey. But be warned, the yeti is always lurking, and one false step could mean certain death. Will you be able to reach the summit and claim victory, or will the mountain claim you as its own? The adventure of a lifetime awaits.
